template.name: vuecomponent
template.value:
<template>
  <section>$content$</section>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "Component",

  props: {
    example: {
      type: String,
      required: false,
      default: "default example"
    }
  },

  data() {
    return {
      //can be objects, arrays, etc
      examples: [
        { name: "News 1", header: "News 1 header", body: "News 1 news info" },
        { name: "News 2", header: "News 2 header", body: "News 2 news info" },
        { name: "News 3", header: "News 3 header", body: "News 3 news info" }
      ]
    };
  },

  methods: {
    readNews(num) {
      this.$emit("read", num);
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss"></style>
